original_text: The name of the first river is the Pishon. It goes through the whole land of Havilah. There is gold in that land.
korean_text: 첫째의 이름은 비손이라 금이 있는 하윌라 온 땅을 둘렀으며

sentences.original_text: The name of the first river is the Pishon
It goes through the whole land of Havilah
There is gold in that land
